pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU. Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400 or better (with up-to-date drivers)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.9
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400 or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes violence, drugs and sexual content. All characters are purely fictional and over the age of 18. All sex scenes in the game are fully consensual.
